# Telegram Bot POS Platform - Project Setup

## Project Overview
A Python-based Telegram bot that functions as a point-of-sale (POS) platform with product management, order processing, and sales tracking.

## Setup Progress

- [x] Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created.
- [ ] Clarify Project Requirements
- [ ] Scaffold the Project
- [ ] Customize the Project
- [ ] Install Required Extensions
- [ ] Compile the Project
- [ ] Create and Run Task
- [ ] Launch the Project
- [ ] Ensure Documentation is Complete

## Technology Stack
- Python 3.8+
- python-telegram-bot library
- SQLite database
- python-dotenv for configuration

## Project Structure
```
beanleafPOS/
├── bot/
│   ├── __init__.py
│   ├── main.py
│   ├── handlers/
│   ├── models/
│   └── utils/
├── config/
├── data/
├── requirements.txt
├── .env.example
└── README.md
```
